sponsors.name: g0v summit 2016
sponsors.desc: g0v Summit 2016 is organized by community volunteers

sponsors.name: Academia Sinica Institute of Information Science
Galaxy Software Services
sponsors.desc:
Established in 1987, we are the leader in Taiwan’ s IT industry and the regional IT software and SaaS cloud service provider. The basis of our innovation and development are: providing long term commitment towards customers’ use case study, sophisticated software engineering, advanced collaboration, use of advanced mobile, IT and cloud technologies. Our innovative applications and tailored solutions has won the heart of over 2000 financial service firms, government organizations, hospitals, telecommunication providers and customers from other industries as well as over 10,000 individual cloud application users. Locations
Taipei, Kaohsiung, Shanghai Awards
2015 GSS awarded the 3nd TAIWAN MITTELSTAND AWARD
2015 2015 Taiwan Excellence Award( Vitals ESP-Enterprise Social Platform) Main products
Vitals ESP – Enterprise Social Platform
teamKube – Task and Meeting Management
Vital – GSS Cloud Services Family

sponsors.name: Teradata
sponsors.desc: Teradata helps companies get more value from data than any other company. Our big data analytic solutions, integrated marketing applications, and team of experts can help your company gain a sustainable competitive advantage with data. Teradata helps organizations leverage all of their data so they can know more about their customers and business and do more of what’s really important. With more than 10,000 professionals in 43 countries, Teradata serves top companies across consumer goods, financial services, healthcare, automotive, communications, travel, hospitality, and more. A future-focused company, Teradata is recognized by media and industry analysts for technological excellence, sustainability, ethics, and business value. Visit teradata.com.

sponsors.name: Industrial Development Bureau, Ministry of Economic Affairs
sponsors.desc:
The Industrial Development Bureau (IDB), Ministry of Economic Affairs implemented the “Open Data Application Promotion Plan” in November 2013, encouraging enterprises to use government data for new product, service and innovative business model. The IDB also assists private organizations to link with public sectors and to urge the government to provide access to more key data.
The IDB commissioned Taipei Computer Association on “Open Data Application Promotion Plan” (http://opendata.tca.org.tw) to hold competitions and provide subsidies, as well as promotion and international opportunity. We’d like to invite everyone who is interested in open data to join the data service industry chain.

sponsors.name: Archilife Research Foundation
sponsors.desc: Since 1987, the Archilife Research Foundation started long-term researches in architecture, sustainability, and go on to other areas of knowledge integration. Efforts including previously giving scholarships in aforementioned areas, and currently holding reading group meetings and communion events for knowledge keepers to better our understandings of the world. Starting from 2011, we also have been sponsoring various open source related events, holding meetups and game jams for local game developers' community, and giving out scholarships to support indie game teams and encourage them to go to international game festivals.

sponsors.name: CLBC
sponsors.desc: As the biggest Coworking Space in Taiwan, CLBC understands the struggles of starting up business. Establishing a coworking space was indeed not an easy task, though it was a fun process to witness all the stories that had been made here! CLBC is not only a space for work, but more of a big family to startups. So, what are you waiting for? Let’s join in to build up more and more stories with us!

sponsors.name: Junyi Academy
sponsors.desc: Junyi, or 均一 in Chinese, means equal and first-class. Our vision is to provide equal opportunity for everyone to study by developing first-class education material online with free access anytime anywhere.

sponsors.name: WeatherRisk
sponsors.desc: WeatherRisk Explore Inc. is the only Taiwanese venture providing with meteorology data analysis and value-added application service. With profession and experiences on weather forecasting, our team has approved by Central Weather Bureau (CWB) to issue weather and marine weather forecasts with several individual and institutional certificate. WeatherRisk has developed more than 300 organizational clients of various walks of life and government authorities. Our products can be categorized as 7 sectors: meteorology data service, meteorology media service, weather forecast and climate assessment, disaster response integration, climate insurance, management maintenance, and popularization education of climate science. By analyzing meteorology data, applying open source software, and value-adding visual designation, WeatherRisk proposes solutions to meteorology related issues. To tackle with more and more frequent extreme weather events under climate change, WeatherRisk contributes to reduce the caused social risk by climate data service.

sponsors.name: NETivism
sponsors.desc: NETivism (Internet for Activism) is a social enterprise focus on solving digital divide for Non-Profit Organization, via Open Source solution(Drupal & CiviCRM) and Love.

sponsors.name: Microsoft
sponsors.desc:
Microsoft Taiwan Corporation has established in Taiwan since 1989. At our core, Microsoft is the productivity and platform company for the mobile-first and cloud-first world. We reinvent productivity to empower every person and every organization on the planet to do more and achieve more.
As a company, and as individuals, we value integrity, honesty, openness, personal excellence, constructive self-criticism, continual self-improvement, and mutual respect. We are committed to our customers and partners and have a passion for technology. We take on big challenges, and pride ourselves on seeing them through. We hold ourselves accountable to our customers, shareholders, partners, and employees by honoring our commitments, providing results, and striving for the highest quality.
Every successful corporation has a responsibility to use its resources and influence to make a positive impact on the world and its people. Microsoft’s Global Citizenship Initiative is focused on mobilizing our resources across the company and around the world, to create opportunities in the communities where we do business, and to fulfill our commitment to serving the public good through innovative technologies and partnerships.

sponsors.name: The National Museum of Prehistory
sponsors.desc:
The National Museum of Prehistory (NMP) is the first world-class museum of archaeology in Taiwan. Together with the Peinan Archaeology Park, the facilities and exhibition unveil the story of Taiwan’s prehistoric as well as contemporary indigenous cultures.
It is hoped that our efforts in research, collection, exhibition, and education serves as a venue for visitors to gain better understanding of the great diversity of Taiwan’s prehistoric and indigenous cultures, so that we may all come to cherish and respect the land and protect the cultures and environment.
We have been devoted to promote the “All Smart Museum Program” since 2016. By introducing online ticket system, digital interactive system, the APP mobile guiding system, digital reconstitution to archeology relic, and the cultural and creative design system, we try to implement cloud based application to this museum. Open data and creative commons will be the next step we embrace. We aim to enhance the quality of services and bring a more friendly and interesting museum to the visitors.

sponsors.name: skymizer
sponsors.desc: Skymizer is a software performance solution provider specializing in compiler optimization. Our core team comes from Andes, Google, HTC, Marvell, MediaTek, Yahoo etc., and is actively involved in renowned worldwide open source projects. We are now working with global leading software companies to create revolutionary products and offer you a better experience in software and life.

sponsors.name: Skywatch
sponsors.desc: Skywatch Innovation was founded in November 2011 by industry veterans and experts in video processing, with financial backing from Vivotek Inc., a leading provider of network cameras and related products. Our video surveillance solution, including hardware and software, has been in operation since 2012, and has been deployed to over 10 countries in the world. We are also expanding toward Home Automation with our IoT service infrastructure, and Smart Retailing with our video analytics technology.

sponsors.name: Taiwan Association of Disaster Prevention Industry
sponsors.desc: The purpose of the Taiwan Association of Disaster Prevention Industry (TADPI) is to engage and integrate the domestic and International disaster prevention related industry chain actively. TADPI attempted to expand the demand and create the new markets worldwide, and promote the disaster prevention technologies that belong to our members. Officially founded on 31 March 2013, the TADPI coordinated organizations and experts in different field and technology related to disaster prevention, such as hazard modeling and simulation, engineering practices, risk management and insurance, geospatial information, monitoring and communications, security and safety, and firefighting. Through the promotion of the relevant businesses, public awareness and adaptability can be strengthened when facing a catastrophe. Furthermore, advocating the strategy of climate change adaptation, formulation of a Business Continuity Plan (BCP) for the cooperation, and to facilitate and building resilient and sustainable societies worldwide. That should be the ultimate goal of TADPI.

sponsors.name: Atos SE
sponsors.desc:
Atos SE (Societas Europaea) is a leader in digital services with pro forma annual revenue of circa € 12 billion and 100,000 employees in 72 countries. Serving a global client base, the Group provides Consulting & Systems Integration services, Managed Services & BPO, Cloud operations, Big Data & Cyber-security solutions, as well as transactional services through Worldline, the European leader in the payments and transactional services industry. With its deep technology expertise and industry knowledge, the Group works with clients across different business sectors: Defense, Financial Services, Health, Manufacturing, Media, Utilities, Public sector, Retail, Telecommunications, and Transportation.
Atos is focused on business technology that powers progress and helps organizations to create their firm of the future. The Group is the Worldwide Information Technology Partner for the Olympic & Paralympic Games and is listed on the Euronext Paris market. Atos operates under the brands Atos, Atos Consulting, Atos Worldgrid, Bull, Canopy, Unify and Worldline.
For more information, visit: atos.net.

sponsors.name: Voxe.org
sponsors.desc:
At Voxe.org, we believe in the power of technology to improve civic engagement and take the power back on politics. We believe in the power of social innovation to help forge an informed electorate. Back to 2012, we build a comparison tool for candidates’ platforms for elections. Simple, neutral and crowdsourced. Voxe.org is now settled in 16 countries and has reached out more than 3,5 million users. As one of the France Google Impact Challenge winner, we’re now working on a mobile app to improve civic engagement and increase our impact on policy : the Newswatch. A civic engagement mobile app based on political news with 3 steps : Information. Position. Action.
Voxe.org’s team recently launched happydemocracy.com. The civic tech media, to bring civic tech events and news to the public.

sponsors.name: Open Knowledge International
sponsors.desc: Open Knowledge is a worldwide non-profit network of people passionate about openness, using advocacy, technology and training to unlock information and enable people to work with it to create and share knowledge.

sponsors.name: National Center for High-performance Computing, NCHC
sponsors.desc: National Center for High-performance Computing (NCHC), founded in 1991, is Taiwan’s only national-level supercomputing center. The NCHC possesses a large computing and networking platform facilities for use by domestic academia and the general public.The NCHC plays a leading role in Taiwan’s cloud technology services by integrating high performance computing (HPC), storage, and networking to provide cloud services in storage, big data analysis, and scientific and engineering simulation.

sponsors.name: Wolf Tea
sponsors.desc: Wolf Tea believes Taiwan has the best tea in the world because of the climate and great tea makers. Each of our offering is a selected single-day-harvest, single-batch-creation which is superior and unique in flavour. We want to share the ever-changing experience of tea tasting, and carefully evaluate each sip. In a way, each taste of tea is “one chance in a lifetime” beautiful experience.

sponsors.name: LIVEhouse.in
sponsors.desc:
No.1 Live Broadcasting Platform in Taiwan
LIVEhouse.in is a brand new live-broadcasting platform developed by iKala team, which has strong technical skills and great design capabilities that can compete with any worldwide leading video platform. Since it’s launch in early 2014, LIVEhouse.in has gained much attention in Taiwan and pan-Asia countries. LIVEhouse.in has hosted over 100,000 live events with prominent enterprises, government departments, video studios, celebrities and public events, such as Public Television Service Taiwan, Computex, Apple Daily, BNext Magazine, TED...ect, bringing live video experience to the next level. We hope to provide you the best video-streaming quality and diverse video marketing showcase.
And now, LIVEhouse.in is not only serving audiences in Taiwan, but also actively seeking opportunities to expand to overseas markets. LIVEhouse.in aims at building the best video streaming eco-system, seeking potential business partners from both international and local markets to create more high-quality programs. We hope that our platform can support people having talent of performing to be introduced to the world.

sponsors.name: KKTIX
sponsors.desc:
Smooth Event Management Experience
Want to get things done efficiently when organizing events? KKTIX keeps everything in just few clicks from creating page, event management, marketing, to selling tickets, all in one place.

sponsors.name: DingTaxi
sponsors.desc: Dingtaxi is created to offer customers the easiest way to find quality charter cars and airport pickup service over 23 countries across the world. DingTaxi save you time by providing the most comprehensive search, showing different fleets and popular travel routes for each attractive destination at a competitive price. Founded in 2014, DIngTaxi is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Our team is composed of global talents from France, Thailand, Canada, China and Taiwan. If you want to participate in a travel startup, we welcome you to contact us!

sponsors.name: g0v summit 2016
sponsors.desc: g0v Summit 2016 為社群義務籌辦

sponsors.name: 財團法人開放文化基金會
中央研究院資訊科學研究所
財團法人RC文化藝術基金會
叡揚資訊
sponsors.desc:
成立於1987年，是台灣資訊軟體業的領導廠商，也是區域級資訊軟體與雲端SaaS 服務供應商。長期關心客戶的經營需求，經由成熟的軟體工程、先進的協同、行動通訊、雲端等資訊科技，開發出流程e化與創新應用系統，贏得金融業、政府、醫院、電信與製造業等2,000餘客戶及上萬個雲端用戶的肯定。 營業據點：
台北、高雄、上海 營業範圍：
兩岸三地及日本 榮耀：
2015 年 榮獲經濟部第三屆卓越中堅企業
2015 年 「Vitals ESP 知識管理企業雲」榮獲「2015台灣精品獎」

sponsors.name: Teradata
sponsors.desc: 與其它企業相比，Teradata天睿公司（Teradata Corporation，紐交所：TDC）協助企業從資料中獲得更多價值。Teradata旗下領先的大數據分析解決方案、整合行銷應用系統及專家團隊協助企業利用資料獲得長期競爭優勢。 Teradata協助企業及各種組織利用資料獲得對客戶和業務的洞察，進而訂定更有效的策略與方案以獲得成功。 在全球43個國家，擁有超過10,000名員工，Teradata為消費品、金融服務、醫療保健、汽車、電信、旅遊、交通、零售等各行業的領先企業提供服務。 做為一個聚焦未來的公司，Teradata的卓越技術、永續經營、企業道德、商業價值廣為媒體和產業分析師所認可，欲瞭解更多詳情，請造訪 www.teradata.com。

sponsors.name: 經濟部工業局
sponsors.desc: 經濟部工業局於2013年11月起，啟動「開放資料產業應用推動計畫」，致力於推動產業應用政府開放資料，期望業者運用政府與企業開放資料開發新產品與服務，創新商業或服務模式，並協助民間連結政府機構，爭取政府資料集開放；本計畫委託台北市電腦公會執行(http://opendata.tca.org.tw)，計畫提供創新競賽、產業補助、行銷推廣與國際合作各項資源，歡迎國內業者與有志之士合作，共同建全國內資料應用環境。

sponsors.name: 祐生研究基金會
sponsors.desc: 祐生研究基金會由推動建築與環境永續發展之研究開始，推動長期的知識累積與人才培養。除了過去建築、環境、生態、健康與資訊社會與文化等面向之碩士論文獎助主題外，本會目前定期舉辦的聯誼會及讀書會，強化祐生成員的知識密度。其後，於 2011 年起，本會持續針對國內開源活動進行贊助，也針對國內獨立遊戲開發者，推動知識與資訊分享聚會，並贊助台灣開發者前往特定國際遊戲競賽，期能幫助國內相關社群之發展。

sponsors.name: CLBC
sponsors.desc: CLBC 為台灣最大的工作空間,我們很可以理解創業本身的艱 難困苦,經營空間本身是一件辛苦但卻有趣的事情,辛苦自然 不在話下,但棒的是許多團隊來到這裡, 並在這空間裡合作創造出來許多故事,CLBC不僅只是一個工作 的地方,更像創業團隊的大家庭,在這發生了許許多多的故 事,也等著你、我一同來共創下一個故事。

sponsors.name: 均一教育平台
sponsors.desc:
中文的免費均等一流教育
均一教育平台是由財團法人誠致教育基金會創辦。我們的目標是透過雲端平台提供免費的『均等、一流』的教育機會給每一個人。
任何人都可以使用網站所有的資源。不管你是學生、老師、自學家庭、校長、二十年後想回去當學生的大人、或是對地球生物好奇的友善外星人，均一的課程內容與資源完全免費提供使用。

sponsors.name: 天氣風險管理開發公司
sponsors.desc: WeatherRisk，天氣風險管理開發，是台灣唯一利用氣象資料創業的公司，配合專業知識與經驗，長時間經營取得多張個人與團體氣象及海象預報證照。雖處資源有限的新創環境，仍將服務深入各行業，客戶包括超過300家國內外企業與公家單位。服務類別分為七大類別，包含氣象數據服務、氣象多媒體服務、天氣預報及氣候評估、防災應變整合、天氣保險、營運持續管理及科普教育和科學推廣。透過氣象數據的處理、開源程式的應用及視覺設計的加值，提供各類氣象相關問題的解決方案。面對氣候變遷下的極端天氣日益增多，以社會企業的理念，希望由資料服務保障大眾降低風險。

sponsors.name: NETivism
sponsors.desc: 網絡行動科技（NETivism）自許為從數位公益出發的社會企業，七年來專注為非營利組織提供以自由軟體為基礎的資訊科技應用解決方案。 我們認為網路資訊科技能夠促成社會變革，影響文化、政治、環境等公共議題，帶來娛樂與商業行為之外的改變。目前提供 netiCRM.tw 支持者關係管理雲端服務，協助非營利組織滿足定期定額線上捐款自動化、電子報行銷、活動報名等需求。

sponsors.name: 微軟
sponsors.desc:
台灣微軟公司設立於 1989 年。我們的使命是——致力讓地球上的每一個人、每一個組織都能貢獻更多、成就更大。
在「行動優先，雲端至上」的世界裡，微軟全力打造業界頂尖的平臺和生產力服務，盼更好地融合終端使用者、開發者以及 IT 專家等各方利益。為了實踐使命，我們將聚焦於重塑生產力和業務流程、構建智慧雲平臺、以及創造更個人化的運算。
微軟相信，良好的公共政策是創新的基石，能夠創造工作機會，並且帶來永續的成長。台灣微軟將持續以開放透明的方式，結合產、官、學、研及民間團體，攜手提倡公民政策，促進社會進步。

sponsors.name: 經濟民主連合 318 結餘款
sponsors.desc:
經濟民主連合，原名「反黑箱服貿民主陣線」，是由數十個台灣公民團體組成的社團聯盟。 在 2016 年 318 運動兩周年論壇，我們確立中期運動目標為：
一、 拒絕服貿、貨貿、亞投行；
二、 莫讓ＴＰＰ傷害台灣；
三、 拒絕「同屬一中」，捍衛台灣人民自決權；
四、 深化民主，推動七項立法：通過民間版監督條例，經貿條約締結應有專法或專章，因應貿易自由化支援調整條例要大修，立法規範中資，反媒體壟斷法應考量中國因素，制定基本工資專法與外國人在台工作專法：
五、繼續對抗兩岸權貴資本及國共政商集團。 完整簡介：http://edutw2016.blogspot.tw/p/blog-page_7.html

sponsors.name: 國立臺灣史前文化博物館
sponsors.desc:
國立臺灣史前文化博物館(簡稱史前館)是台灣首座國家級考古學博物館，結合康樂本館的建築與展示，以及卑南文化公園的遺址現場，共同為大眾開啟通往臺灣史前和當代原住民與南島文化的世界，期望經由博物館的研究、收藏、展示及教育功能，促進大眾對臺灣史前文化的豐富多樣性，產生更為深刻的認識與感受，讓人們更珍惜、尊重這片土地上綿延不斷的自然與文化生命。
史前館於105年開始推動「智慧型博物館」，導入電子票券系統、數位互動展示系統、智慧APP導覽系統、智慧文物修復系統、智慧文創系統及雲端應用資源整合系統，並開展open data、creative commons 的機制， 提昇以觀眾為主體的服務品質，強化全方位的「文化學習」與「文化旅遊」服務，營造一個友善及有趣的智慧型博物館園區。

sponsors.name: skymizer
sponsors.desc:
Skymizer 是一個致力於效能解決方案的頂尖開發團隊，藉由其獨到的編譯器最佳化技術，強化軟體品質、增加效能。我們也提供開發工具與顧問服務，協助客戶加速其行動裝置、軟體、伺服器。
我們成立於 2013 年冬季， 技術團隊來自世界各大知名軟硬體公司（Andes, Google, HTC, Marvell, MediaTek, Yahoo），團隊成員擁有豐富的跨國產品開發經驗。我們不只優化你的軟體，更優化你的工作與生活。

sponsors.name: Skywatch
sponsors.desc: 行品股份有限公司（Skywatch Innovation）創立於 2011年 11月，為業界資深專案開發、影像技術人員、與台灣安控上市公司所共同組成。我們的核心能力在於設計、開發、與提供物聯網（IoT）之平台與服務。Skywatch 解決方案完整涵蓋由攝影機、感應器等前端硬體、雲端服務器，到近端 Mobile Apps 與瀏覽器等。主力雲端影像服務，自 2012 年推出以來，已經應用在十幾個國家，並業已成為台灣政府部門的正式認證供應商之一。

sponsors.name: 臺灣防災產業協會
sponsors.desc: 臺灣防災產業協會以整合國內防災產業鏈，共同推動並擴展國內外防災產業市場、落實實務防災技術及提昇我國防災水準為宗旨，期望整合國內產官學於災害防救技術之能量。本協會提供協調整合各方資源之平台，促成災害防救科技發展體系的垂直與水平整合與創意激發，強化國內防災科技與產業實力，促進國內產業升級與輸出，創造就業機會等實質效益。藉由本協會強化全民面對巨災之防災意識與緊急應變能力之外，同時亦可協助企業研擬制訂企業營運持續方案(BCP)，協助政府推動防災與國家永續發展目標。

sponsors.name: Atos 源訊
sponsors.desc:
Atos SE (Societas Europaea) 源訊是一家全球性的資訊服務公司，年收入 120 億歐元和擁有 100,000 專業業務技術人員在 72 個國家。為全球客戶提供服務，它提供了高科技的維運管理、諮詢、系統整合和管理、雲端、大數據、網路安全等解決方案之服務。Atos 源訊所提供科技專業及產業知識，橫跨國防、金融保險、醫健、製造、能源、媒體、公共事業、零售、電信交通等產業。
Atos 源訊專注於企業的技術專業和產業精進，幫助企業自己建立公司的未來。它同時也是奧運及殘奧會賽事長期資訊科技合作夥伴，並於巴黎-泛歐交易所上市。Atos 擁有的品牌包括：Atos、Atos Consulting、Atos Worldgrid、Bull、Canopy、Unify 及 Worldline。
更多服務訊息，請造訪我們網站 : atos.net。

sponsors.name: Voxe.org
sponsors.desc:
At Voxe.org, we believe in the power of technology to improve civic engagement and take the power back on politics. We believe in the power of social innovation to help forge an informed electorate. Back to 2012, we build a comparison tool for candidates’ platforms for elections. Simple, neutral and crowdsourced. Voxe.org is now settled in 16 countries and has reached out more than 3,5 million users. As one of the France Google Impact Challenge winner, we’re now working on a mobile app to improve civic engagement and increase our impact on policy : the Newswatch. A civic engagement mobile app based on political news with 3 steps : Information. Position. Action.
Voxe.org’s team recently launched happydemocracy.com. The civic tech media, to bring civic tech events and news to the public.

sponsors.name: Open Knowledge International
sponsors.desc: Open Knowledge is a worldwide non-profit network of people passionate about openness, using advocacy, technology and training to unlock information and enable people to work with it to create and share knowledge.

sponsors.name: 國家高速網路與計算中心
sponsors.desc:
National Center for High-performance Computing, NCHC
簡稱國網中心 於1991年成立，擁有全台灣唯一共用之大型計算平台及學術研究網路設施，肩負計算、儲存、網路、平台整合的前瞻雲端技術先導角色，提供國內各界高速計算、高品質網路、高效能儲存、大資料分析及科學工程模擬等雲端整合服務。

sponsors.name: 琅茶
sponsors.desc: 琅茶立志將台灣茶細膩之美，傳遞給全世界！每季親訪產地，嚴選上質茶園在最適天氣時辰，由優秀茶師採製的「單品茶」(Single Origin)，詳載茶事，與時俱進，售完不再，真正感受每片山林「此刻此地・獨一無二」的純粹美好。一起品遍千變萬化的台灣茶吧！開展好茶地圖，認識自己的味蕾，找到屬於你「琅琅上口」的好茶。

sponsors.name: LIVEhouse.in
sponsors.desc:
台灣第一大直播社群平台
LIVEhouse.in 為一嶄新台灣國產直播平台,其開發團隊擁有堅強技術及設計能力,備受各界肯定。自 2014 年初上線以來,LIVEhouse.in 已經播出超過 100,000 場直播節目。LIVEhouse.in 正積極與國內各產業進行跨界合作,我們擁有豐富經驗並累積許多成功客戶,包括公視、Computex、蘋果日報、數位時代、TED 講座 ... 等等,讓您擁有最佳影音品質和影音行銷操作實例。
LIVEhouse.in 期望除了在台灣扎根,也積極邁向國際市場。目標是希望能結合國內外的合作夥伴,打造出最完善的影音生態圈,也將台灣的表演人才帶上國際的舞台。

sponsors.name: KKTIX
sponsors.desc:
輕鬆流暢的活動管理體驗
每次舉辦活動的時候，都在煩惱怎麼製作網頁、處理報名事宜嗎?
KKTIX滿足您舉辦活動的各項需求，從建立、管理、行銷到售票，一切都在彈指之間完成。

sponsors.name: DingTaxi
sponsors.desc: DingTaxi—全球線路覆蓋最全的線上訂車平台。 目前已提供23個國家的目的地服務。持續拓展開發中。 國內外機場接送,包車等大小事將由DingTaxi幫您搞定！近期內將推出智慧機場接駁車服務! 創立於2014, DingTaxi公司總部位於台北，台灣。團隊由來自法國，加拿大，中國，泰國, 台灣等國際人才組成。對於熱愛旅遊的技術夥伴，歡迎加入我們的開發行列!
